Text:
Sorry - don't like leaving negative comments (as there seem to be so many all over this site that're unnecessary) but as far as I can see this is a rip off - and I've completely wasted my time & share ratio!

RAR file requires password that you can only get from a pay site - this is unnacceptable, certainly against the spirit of TPB & if so this user should be warned/barred!

[Also, why (?!?!) does anyone still RAR video files - they don't seem to take up ANY less space and are a pain for both parties?]
Not to mention its a DVD rip, not a full DVD.  Wrong category too.
